seg-source.mrk: derby.database.classpath

target.mrk: derby.database.classpath

seg-source.mrk: derby.database.classpath

target.mrk: derby.database.classpath

seg-source.mrk: database-wide properties

target.mrk: database-wide properties

seg-source.mrk: setting classpath for jar files

target.mrk: setting classpath for jar files

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Specifies the classpath that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> should use when searching for jar files in a database. This property must be set to enable <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to load classes from jar files installed with the <xref href="rrefstorejarinstall.dita#rrefstorejarinstall"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the classpath that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> should use when searching for jar files in a database.

This property must be set to enable <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to load classes from jar files installed with the <xref href="rrefstorejarinstall.dita#rrefstorejarinstall"></xref>.

target.mrk: Specifies the classpath that <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> should use when searching for jar files in a database.

This property must be set to enable <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to load classes from jar files installed with the <xref href="rrefstorejarinstall.dita#rrefstorejarinstall"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to do the following:

seg-source.mrk: Make sure to do the following:

target.mrk: Make sure to do the following:

trans-unit.source: Separate jar files with a colon (<codeph>:</codeph>).

seg-source.mrk: Separate jar files with a colon (<codeph>:</codeph>).

target.mrk: Separate jar files with a colon (<codeph>:</codeph>).

trans-unit.source: Use fully qualified identifiers for the jar files (schema name and jar name).

seg-source.mrk: Use fully qualified identifiers for the jar files (schema name and jar name).

target.mrk: Use fully qualified identifiers for the jar files (schema name and jar name).

trans-unit.source: Set the property as a database-level property for the database.

seg-source.mrk: Set the property as a database-level property for the database.

target.mrk: Set the property as a database-level property for the database.

trans-unit.source: searches the user's classpath before it searches the jar files specified by the derby.database.classpath property setting. To force to search the database only, remove the classes from the user classpath.

seg-source.mrk: searches the user's classpath before it searches the jar files specified by the derby.database.classpath property setting.
To force <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to search the database only, remove the classes from the user classpath.

target.mrk: searches the user's classpath before it searches the jar files specified by the derby.database.classpath property setting.
To force <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> to search the database only, remove the classes from the user classpath.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> searches for classes and resources in the order specified by the property setting.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> searches for classes and resources in the order specified by the property setting.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> searches for classes and resources in the order specified by the property setting.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the section "Loading classes from a database" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>. For reference information on system procedures for storing jar files in a database, see "<xref href="crefstorejardb.dita#crefstorejardb"></xref>."

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the section "Loading classes from a database" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.
For reference information on system procedures for storing jar files in a database, see "<xref href="crefstorejardb.dita#crefstorejardb"></xref>."

target.mrk: For more information, see the section "Loading classes from a database" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.
For reference information on system procedures for storing jar files in a database, see "<xref href="crefstorejardb.dita#crefstorejardb"></xref>."

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.classpath', 'colonSeparatedJarFiles')

target.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.classpath', 'colonSeparatedJarFiles')

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

seg-source.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.classpath', 'APP.ToursLogic:APP.ACCOUNTINGLOGIC')

target.mrk: -- database-level property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.database.classpath', 'APP.ToursLogic:APP.ACCOUNTINGLOGIC')

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: Dynamic; the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
